sourcesContent:
import './PersonalInfo.css' function PersonalInfo({ state, Dispatch,form,setform}) { return (

Personal info

Please provide your name, email address, and phone number.

{ e.preventDefault(); setform(e.target.value) }} name='fullName' type='text' id='name' className={`p-md-3 mb-md-2 mb-2 p-2 ${state.NameAlert}`} placeholder='e.g ds King' /> {state.NameLength>0?"": {state.nameError}}
{state.mailError }
{state.phoneError }
) } export default PersonalInfo
